attributes.action: dont follow srilanka type electoral reforms
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: dont have electoral reforms like in srilanka. the proportional representative system has done more harm to the people and created corrupt governments and officials beyond imagination. a ward member should have a ward so that he /she is responsible for the people of the ward. proportional representative system will result in no member being responsible for anybody. study srilankan politics before making changes. dont follow them
